elements.text: You don’t feel very steady on your feet as you walk to your table at your favorite restaurant. You see other customers turn their heads to look at you as you walk by. Whether or not they think you walked oddly, your meal will be...

elements.name: Favorite Restaurant_Early/Mid-Stage Symptoms_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
